SKU658471.Name: Flutter Slipcover Sofa

"I have literally carried around a picture of a ruffled sofa since I don't even know when, just waiting for the right moment. And this became the moment," Kara confesses. "I fell in love with the ruffle the minute I saw it. It has a lot of personality, but it can also go into so many different interiors. I can't wait to have it in my own house." CB2 exclusive.

SKU376528.Name: Saic Quantam Charcoal Grey Rocking Chair
SKU376528.Description: Chill spot. SAIC Quantam Rocking Chair was created exclusively for Design Collab. This CB2 collaborative brings together like-minded souls and design institutions. Design Collab No. 2 asked 12 students in the Designed Objects curriculum at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago (SAIC), "What does 'live well' mean in the context of home design?" Student Taeyoung Choi created an elegant and extraordinarily comfortable place to chill out and just relax. Using the science of ergonomics, Choi came up with a design that, "traces the shape of the human body and allows you to become totally immersed in the chair." SKU376468.Name: Saic Quantam Gunsmoke Rocking Chair

This CB2 collaborative, now in its second year, brings together like-minded souls and design institutions. Design Collab No. 2 asked 12 students in the Designed Objects curriculum at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago (SAIC), "What does 'live well' mean in the context of home design?" Student Taeyoung Choi created an elegant and extraordinarily comfortable place to chill out and just relax. Using the science of ergonomics, Choi came up with a design that, "traces the shape of the human body and allows you to become totally immersed in the chair." Sculptural curved catalpa wood legs support cozy poly-blend upholstery in a warm, modern neutral. A welcoming spot for reading, watching tv or a little cat nap.
